short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract specific information from group join requests, such as emails, numbers, or names,

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Transform Your Facebook Groups into Powerful Lead Generation Machines with JoinQuest Collector! 🌟

JoinQuest Collector is the ultimate Chrome extension designed for savvy marketers and community managers who want to leverage their Facebook group memberships for targeted lead generation. With an array of powerful features, you can streamline your workflows and boost engagement like never before!

✨ Key Features:

🔍 Extract Critical Data: Automatically gather vital information like names, emails, and phone numbers directly from Facebook group joining questions. Perfect for building a comprehensive leads database!

📂 Easy Data Export: Convert your collected data into handy Excel or CSV formats. Organize contacts seamlessly and enhance your marketing efforts with just a few clicks!

💬 Auto Welcome Message: Engage new members instantly! Set up custom welcome messages that automatically greet new additions to your groups, making them feel valued and increasing group interaction.

🔄 Multi-Group Management: Apply all these incredible features across multiple Facebook groups you manage. Maximize your reach and efficiency without multiplying your workload!

🎉 Special Launch Offer! 🎉

Use the coupon code FIRST50 at checkout to receive an incredible 30% discount for the first 50 users! Don't miss out on transforming your Facebook group strategy!

🔗 Ready to elevate your Facebook strategy? give it a try.
